author: Luc299

review: Love the Fire TV Stick I have 3 of them also love prime.
author: Barbara A Mullins

review: If you are a PRIME member this is a very very cool thing to have!  I am a Roku user for the most part and like the volume of content provided free on Roku especially when partnered with www.playon.tv... but with a PRIME membership more recent content is available via Prime.For the record I can get Prime using Roku and PlayOn... but there is a notable difference in speed of access with the Fire TV stick... and too the shows play in succession with the stick.  With my other method I have to start each show (when watching a TV series).Great addition to my TV arsenal!

review: I really like it,too bad that in Costa Rica doesn't do a lot with the apps.,most of all I use to wath Netflix and some times youtube.Bu tis really easy to use

review: So fast. So easy. Worth it.
author: J. Danna

review: It was a gift...but perhaps the gift that keeps on taking. I've had to upgrade my internet, then will pay for whatever streaming video we select. Frankly, Netflix is easier and more reliable.
